head.title: Caryn B. Parness and Keith E. Evans

hedline.hl1: Caryn B. Parness and Keith E. Evans

block.p: Caryn Blaine Parness, a daughter of Arlyne and Mel Parness of Chestnut Ridge, N.Y., is to be married today to Keith Eric Evans, a son of Yvonne and Tom Evans of Whitman, Mass. Rabbi Reuben Katz is to officiate at the New York Hilton.
The bride and the bridegroom graduated from Emerson College.

Caryn Blaine Parness, a daughter of Arlyne and Mel Parness of Chestnut Ridge, N.Y., is to be married today to Keith Eric Evans, a son of Yvonne and Tom Evans of Whitman, Mass. Rabbi Reuben Katz is to officiate at the New York Hilton.
The bride and the bridegroom graduated from Emerson College.
The bride, 26, was until recently a teacher at Kids Are People, a preschool in Boston. Her father is the executive vice president of Bnai Zion, a fraternal organization in New York.
The bridegroom, 24, is a sales manager in Boston for the Rockport Company, a clothing manufacturer. His father is the principal of the Holt School in Whitman. WEDDINGS
